channel.title: Comments on: Cadbury Bar of Plenty + Win Chocolate worth $50

item.title: By: Conor
item.dc:creator: Conor
item.description: I love chocolate because chocolate is always there for you when no one else is it helps you through the day and night and always tastes sweet!
item.content:encoded: I love chocolate because chocolate is always there for you when no one else is it helps you through the day and night and always tastes sweet!

item.title: By: Cath Kenny
item.dc:creator: Cath Kenny
item.description: I love chocolate because chocolate loves me!
item.content:encoded: I love chocolate because chocolate loves me!

item.title: By: Cheyne Ennis
item.dc:creator: Cheyne Ennis
item.description: Chocolate not only gives me a relaxing high with the sensation of excitement and elation. I find dark chocolate really does it for me.
item.content:encoded: Chocolate not only gives me a relaxing high with the sensation of excitement and elation. I find dark chocolate really does it for me.

item.title: By: Beck Hinshelwood
item.dc:creator: Beck Hinshelwood
item.description: I love chocolate because it always solves a problem, it never talks back and you can get it anywhere, anytime.
item.content:encoded: I love chocolate because it always solves a problem, it never talks back and you can get it anywhere, anytime.

item.title: By: Jazz
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description: It never disappoints, available whenever you need it, always tastes great and has a great package!
item.content:encoded: It never disappoints, available whenever you need it, always tastes great and has a great package!

item.title: By: trudie
item.dc:creator: trudie
item.description: i love chocolate b/c it never lets you down. Always smooth and creamy and guaranteed to make you smile.
item.content:encoded: i love chocolate b/c it never lets you down. Always smooth and creamy and guaranteed to make you smile.

item.title: By: Juliana
item.dc:creator: Juliana
item.description: Chocolate? I like chocolate...interestingly I can go days and days without it...while sometimes I just have a crave for it...Cadbury? I haven't had Cadbury for ages :-(
item.content:encoded: Chocolate? I like chocolate…interestingly I can go days and days without it…while sometimes I just have a crave for it…Cadbury? I haven’t had Cadbury for ages üôÅ

item.title: By: Katherine Ryan
item.dc:creator: Katherine Ryan
item.description:
Drizzled over rich desserts, sprinkled onto cakes, When it comes to chocolate I won't take any fakes (this means you carob!) With hazelnuts or honeycomb, white or dark or milk, Picnic, full of crunchy nuts, or Lindt, smooth as silk!
Truffles, mini chocolate treats, gone within one bite, After dinner mints, filled with fondant-y delight, Best of all's a square of dark melting in the mouth, Improve on perfection? I don't know how!
item.content:encoded:
Drizzled over rich desserts, sprinkled onto cakes,
When it comes to chocolate I won’t take any fakes (this means you carob!)
With hazelnuts or honeycomb, white or dark or milk,
Picnic, full of crunchy nuts, or Lindt, smooth as silk!

Truffles, mini chocolate treats, gone within one bite,
After dinner mints, filled with fondant-y delight,
Best of all’s a square of dark melting in the mouth,
Improve on perfection? I don’t know how!

item.title: By: teresa
item.dc:creator: teresa
item.description: i love chocalate because i have sweet memories as a child eating chocalate out of a jar with a spoon and having it explained to my mother wth a chocalate grin. My grandmother new about my addiction to chocalate.....:)
item.content:encoded: i love chocalate because i have sweet memories as a child eating chocalate out of a jar with a spoon and having it explained to my mother wth a chocalate grin. My grandmother new about my addiction to chocalate…..:)

item.title: By: Celeste @ Berrytravels
item.dc:creator: Celeste @ Berrytravels
item.description: I am in love with chocolate because chocolate soothes and calms and never breaks the heart.
item.content:encoded: I am in love with chocolate because chocolate soothes and calms and never breaks the heart.
